long_description: Used underneath your MSR Carbon Reflex 3 tent, this nylon tarp extends the tent's life by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear. Sizing specific to the tent prevents water from pooling between the tent and footprint in rainy weather. Carbon Reflex 3 footprint will add approximately 11 oz. to your pack.
short_description: Used underneath your MSR Carbon Reflex 3 tent, this nylon tarp extends the tent's life by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear.
